channel.title: [PI] Adding Nex
channel.description:
So I started adding Nex with this tut - http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,537710.0.html But after client side, I got these errors.
[code] src\EntityDef.java:16: cannot find symbol symbol : variable entitydef location: class EntityDef entitydef.aByte68 = 1; ^ src\EntityDef.java:17: cannot find symbol symbol : variable entitydef location: class EntityDef entitydef.readValues(stream); // Collect original NPC data ^ src\EntityDef.java:18: cannot find symbol symbol : variable entitydef location: class EntityDef entitydef.itemActions = new String[5]; ^ src\EntityDef.java:19: cannot find symbol symbol : variable entitydef location: class EntityDef entitydef.itemActions[1] = "Attack"; ^ src\EntityDef.java:20: cannot find symbol symbol : variable entitydef location: class EntityDef entitydef.anIntArray94 = new int[1]; ^ src\EntityDef.java:21: cannot find symbol symbol : variable entitydef location: class EntityDef entitydef.anIntArray94[0] = 62717;//Npc's plate ^ src\EntityDef.java:22: cannot find symbol symbol : variable entitydef location: class EntityDef entitydef.name = "Nex"; ^ src\EntityDef.java:23: cannot find symbol symbol : variable entitydef location: class EntityDef entitydef.combatLevel = 1001;//Combat Level ^ src\EntityDef.java:24: cannot find symbol symbol : variable entitydef location: class EntityDef entitydef.description = "Even the gods fear it.".getBytes(); ^ src\EntityDef.java:25: cannot find symbol symbol : variable entitydef location: class EntityDef entitydef.anInt77 = 6320;//stand animation ^ src\EntityDef.java:26: cannot find symbol symbol : variable entitydef location: class EntityDef entitydef.anInt67 = 6319;//walk animation ^ src\Class36.java:22: cannot find symbol symbol : constructor Class18(Stream,int) location: class Class18 Class18 class18 = new Class18(stream, 0); ^ Note: src\client.java uses unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. 12 errors Press any key to continue . . . [/code]

item.title: [PI] Adding Nex
item.dc:creator: @TormentedSoul TormentedSoul
item.description:
@TormentedSoul wrote:

You obviously added it wrong because I tested this on 3 different clients.

item.title: [PI] Adding Nex
item.dc:creator: @zond zond
item.description:
@zond wrote:

So I started adding Nex with this tut - http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,537710.0.html
But after client side, I got these errors.

src\EntityDef.java:16: cannot find symbol
symbol  : variable entitydef
location: class EntityDef
                        entitydef.aByte68 = 1;
                        ^
src\EntityDef.java:17: cannot find symbol
symbol  : variable entitydef
location: class EntityDef
                entitydef.readValues(stream); // Collect original NPC data
                ^
src\EntityDef.java:18: cannot find symbol
symbol  : variable entitydef
location: class EntityDef
                entitydef.itemActions = new String[5];
                ^
src\EntityDef.java:19: cannot find symbol
symbol  : variable entitydef
location: class EntityDef
                entitydef.itemActions[1] = "Attack";
                ^
src\EntityDef.java:20: cannot find symbol
symbol  : variable entitydef
location: class EntityDef
                entitydef.anIntArray94 = new int[1];
                ^
src\EntityDef.java:21: cannot find symbol
symbol  : variable entitydef
location: class EntityDef
                entitydef.anIntArray94[0] = 62717;//Npc's plate
                ^
src\EntityDef.java:22: cannot find symbol
symbol  : variable entitydef
location: class EntityDef
                entitydef.name = "Nex";
                ^
src\EntityDef.java:23: cannot find symbol
symbol  : variable entitydef
location: class EntityDef
                entitydef.combatLevel = 1001;//Combat Level
                ^
src\EntityDef.java:24: cannot find symbol
symbol  : variable entitydef
location: class EntityDef
                entitydef.description = "Even the gods fear it.".getBytes();
                ^
src\EntityDef.java:25: cannot find symbol
symbol  : variable entitydef
location: class EntityDef
                entitydef.anInt77 = 6320;//stand animation
                ^
src\EntityDef.java:26: cannot find symbol
symbol  : variable entitydef
location: class EntityDef
                entitydef.anInt67 = 6319;//walk animation
                ^
src\Class36.java:22: cannot find symbol
symbol  : constructor Class18(Stream,int)
location: class Class18
                Class18 class18 = new Class18(stream, 0);
                                  ^
Note: src\client.java uses unchecked or unsafe operations.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details.
12 errors
Press any key to continue . . .

Read full topic
